subTitle: Ask us anything about Dawn Web's services and products, and get factual responses.

faqs.question: Can you help me with my online marketing efforts?
faqs.answer: Yes! We offer a range of digital marketing services including SEO, email marketing, and pay-per-click advertising. We'll work with you to create a strategy tailored to your business goals.

faqs.question: Do you offer ongoing website maintenance and support?
faqs.answer: Absolutely. All our plans include ongoing support and regular updates to ensure your website stays secure and up-to-date.

faqs.question: How do you ensure my website is optimized for search engines?
faqs.answer: We implement the latest SEO best practices, including metadata configuration, keyword optimization, image alt tags, and performance enhancements to help your website rank better in search engines.

faqs.question: Can I request more updates or custom features per month?
faqs.answer: Yes. Each plan includes a set number of monthly updates, but you can always request additional changes as an add-on. Contact us for pricing and turnaround time.

faqs.question: I'm not sure which package is right for me. Can you help?
faqs.answer: Definitely! Get in touch with us and we’ll guide you through the best package based on your business goals, technical needs, and budget.

faqs.question: Is the (Annual Plan 20% OFF) a one-time payment or recurring?
faqs.answer: The annual plan is billed once per year at a discounted rate compared to monthly billing. It's a recurring subscription unless canceled.

faqs.question: What Add-ons do you offer?
faqs.answer: We offer several add-ons including e-commerce setup, advanced analytics, custom integrations, multilingual support, and more. Let us know your needs and we’ll recommend the right add-ons.
